text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA #DrHahn you're a spineless excuse for a doctor and you should lose your license for allowing @realDonaldTrump's lie about 99% #COVID19 cases are harmless.  You are supposed to Due No Harm.  You're harming millions of Americans with your silence. #COVIDIOTS #Biden2020
